actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Power Act for the purpose of requiring that a determination that a utility selling electricity at wholesale is subject to Federal rate-making regulations be based on more than the fact that such utility has electric facilities which are physically connected with electric facilities of any other utility.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Power Act to require that a determination that a person who is engaged in the sale of electricity at wholesale is subject to the ratemaking jurisdiction of the Federal Power Commission shall be based on more than the fact that such person has facilities for the generation, transmission, or sale of electricity which are physically connected to the electric facilities of any other person.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Power Act for the purpose of requiring that a determination that a utility selling electricity at wholesale is subject to Federal rate-making regulations be based on more than the fact that such utility has electric facilities which are physically connected with electric facilities of any other utility.
